kw.name: Suite Setup for login page
Suite Setup for home page
Open Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Opens the home page of the application.

kw.name: Verify Home Page Title
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Verifies that the home page title is correct.
Opens the home page and verifies the title.

kw.name: Open Login Page
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Opens the login page of the application.

kw.name: Enter Login Credentials
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters the login credentials into the login form.

kw.name: Click login Button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Clicks the login button to submit the login form.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Opens the login page and logs in with valid credentials.

test.name: Product review submission test case

Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
Clicks the Home button in the My Account section.

Wait Until Keyword Succeeds

Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Enter review details
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'John Doe' into text field 'id=input-name'.

kw.name: Input Text

kw.name: Click Element

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Verify review submission
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[@class='alert alert-success alert-dismissible']' contains text 'Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval.'.
kw.arg: Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Verifies that the review submission was successful.

test.doc: This test case verifies the product review submission functionality.
